name: Styrene/ butadiene/ acrylonitrile copolymers (SBAN)
FoodContactSubstance: Styrene/ butadiene/ acrylonitrile copolymers (SBAN) (CAS Reg. No., exclusive of minor monomers, is 9003-56-9), copolymerized with not more than 10 percent of one or more of the monomers of acrylic acid, fumaric acid, 2-hydroxyethyl acrylate, itaconic acid and methacrylic acid, manufactured according to the method described in this notification.
manufacturer: The Dow Chemical Company, Trinseo LLC and Styron Holding B.V.
